Welcome to career.place, where candidates are evaluated on what matters; fairly, objectively, and without bias

The career.place Process

Step

Match needs & requirements

All candidates are held to the same standards

Employer
  • Identifies required attributes, skills, knowledge, & abilities
  • Defines benefits, travel, location, and salary range
Candidate
  • Answers simple yes/no to skills, knowledge, and attribute
  • Complete short knowledge quiz
  • Takes short soft skill assessments

Reinventing how we hire
